title: BRIEF-Anglo American Says Value Of Rough Diamond Sales For De Beers' Eighth Sales Cycle Of 2019, Amounts To $295 Mln
text:
BRIEF-Anglo American Says Value Of Rough Diamond Sales For De Beers' Eighth Sales Cycle Of 2019, Amounts To $295 Mln

Stock Markets 40 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 08:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Anglo American Says Value Of Rough Diamond Sales For De Beers' Eighth Sales Cycle Of 2019, Amounts To $295 Mln Oct 3 (Reuters) - Anglo American PLC : * ANGLO AMERICAN PLC - DE BEERS ROUGH DIAMOND SALES CYCLE 8, 2019 * ANGLO AMERICAN PLC - VALUE OF ROUGH DIAMOND SALES FOR DE BEERS' EIGHTH SALES CYCLE OF 2019, AMOUNTING TO $295 MILLION.
